CustomField.description: Updates field to renewal business if at least one opp already exists on same account. Determines whether marketing efforts are paying off as marketing goal is to build more new clients than return clients. Determines client retention and % of business which is New v. Return Clients
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Updates field to renewal business if at least one opp already exists on same account. Determines whether marketing efforts are paying off as marketing goal is to build more new clients than return clients. Determines client retention and % of business which is New v. Return Clients
CustomField.label: New v. Return Client
